__e: Ungh. Oh Toxie, in my blind eyes you are the most beautiful man in the world.

Anyway, I know it's a shot in the dark, but--
I'm just going full-blown Magoo right now.
Look, it's not as blind as you think.
I know you think I've always got my mom goggles on, but I'm not as blind as you think.
But it's no longer possible to be blind and stupid, or for you to think me so.
I don't want people to say: "Her mother was blind, so she never learnt anything."
Raising a baby... It's hard when you can see. But trying to do it when you can't, alone...
So blind not to see that the perfect guy was standing right there in front of me.
No, because it's impossible for her to be so blind that she doesn't see how wrong you are for her.

That it wasn't because I went blind, that's not why it didn't work out?
Here lies the blind man who used to be my patient.
but I'm going blind, and don't understand anything.
